title: Merger Monday, Chinese Investment in Africa, Wall St. Eyes Sports Gambling
itunes:title: Merger Monday, Chinese Investment in Africa, Wall St. Eyes Sports Gambling
description:
Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Ed Hammond discusses Novartis, Schwab and LVMH acquisitions. Jake Bright, TechCrunch Contributor, talks about Chinese investment in Africa’s tech-ecosystem. Nadav Kidron, CEO at Oramed Pharmaceuticals, explains the development of an insulin pill for the treatment of Type 2 diabetes. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa break down Wall Street wading into sports gambling. And we Drive to the Close with Dryden Pence, CIO at Pence Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
